name: Tuna Steaks with Garlic-Herb Cream Sauce
author: thedailygourmet
summary: Tuna steaks are dressed up with a dreamy garlic-herb cream sauce. I served mine on top of wilted spinach.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup garlic-and-herb spreadable cheese (such as Alouette®)
directions: Heat a nonstick skillet over medium heat
Melt butter in the hot skillet
Season tuna steaks with salt and pepper and place in the skillet
Cook for 3 to 4 minutes per side
Remove to a serving plate and keep warm
Add half-and-half and spreadable cheese to the same skillet and stir until incorporated
Set 2 tablespoons of the sauce aside
Add spinach to the remaining sauce in the skillet and cook until wilted, 1 to 2 minutes
Divide spinach between 2 plates and place tuna steaks on top
Serve reserved sauce over the steaks
